t: Amazon Colors - Hex and RGB Color Codes
s: In each colored box you will find the hex color code, which is made up of the 6 letters/numbers beside the pound sign. We have also listed the rbg code, which is the amount of red, green, and blue that is combined in various proportions to obtain that particular color.
